Name: Owinka Shooter
About the game: Welcome to OWINKA SHOOTER. In this masterpiece of gaming, you play as Owinka 427, who finds himself in the middle of an action packed journey involving an escape from an evil Owinka facility. The Owinka Television Institute of Technology Televesion is not a force to be meddled with, so be prepared for a wave of bean-shaped enemies, ready to stop you at any cost. In this game, you are mysteriously given a gun with infinite ammo. You will fight your way through arcade-like levels and solve small puzzles along the way. You may find yourself in the company of a small friend from time to time... With slight gameplay changes from level to level, this short game is sure to provide something for everyone!
